fields.value: Replication data for: Ruggedness: The Blessing of Bad Geography in Africa

authorAffiliation.value: IMDEA Social Sciences Institute and CEPR

datasetContactAffiliation.value: IMDEA Social Sciences Institute and CEPR

publicationCitation.value: Nunn, Nathan, and Puga, Diego, (2012) "Ruggedness: The Blessing of Bad Geography in Africa." Review of Economics and Statistics 94:1, 20-36.

files.description: The surface area of each 30 arc-second cell, which must be used to weight the ruggedness measures when averaging across areas,  provided as a compressed ASCII grid for use in GIS software
files.label: cellarea.zip
categories: c) GIS Data (for researchers interested in using the terrain ruggedness variables for different geographic units)

dataFile.description: The surface area of each 30 arc-second cell, which must be used to weight the ruggedness measures when averaging across areas,  provided as a compressed ASCII grid for use in GIS software

files.description: Country-level data (download as original file for Stata format expected by the do file)
files.label: rugged_data.tab

dataFile.description: Country-level data (download as original file for Stata format expected by the do file)

files.description: Stata do file that re-creates the regression tables contained in the article
files.label: rugged_regr.do

dataFile.description: Stata do file that re-creates the regression tables contained in the article

files.label: rugged_regr.log

files.description: Underlying average slope data at the level of individual 30 arc-second cells on a  grid across the surface of the Earth provided as a compressed ASCII grid for use in GIS software
files.label: slope.zip
categories: c) GIS Data (for researchers interested in using the terrain ruggedness variables for different geographic units)

dataFile.description: Underlying average slope data at the level of individual 30 arc-second cells on a  grid across the surface of the Earth provided as a compressed ASCII grid for use in GIS software
